A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Star Wars: The Last Ex Machina

If you are a casual moviegoer or child\, you will enjoy this film. If you are a cinephile or true star wars fan you will not..

This movie has great visuals and hints of greatness here and there. However\, the script\, humor\, and pacing is very poor.

Too many forced jokes\, a lot of plot holes\, and uses of ex machina's to save the main characters. Everything set up in TFA turns to nothing and anti-climactic. It's okay to do this for one plot point\, but when it is every single one it's bad.

This movie attempts to be too non-conformist from past star wars that is falls on its face. Feels a lot like a marvel/transformers mash up.
